description: A mock single page application site for streaming videos
detail: Brainflix is a school project to build out a prototype for a new video streaming platform. A package and mockup of the final product was provided. Mock API is used to obtain data for videos.
functionality: Clicikng videos from the 'Next Video' list takes user to its detail page.
Every video has its detailed page which displays all the information such as likes, views, author and comments.
User can upload a new mock video.

detail: Brainfarm is a hackathon project. We did pair programming to collaborative over a relatively short period of time of 24 hours. The purpose of this project was to make a simple farming browser game.
functionality: Every crop needs to be watered each day until fully grown.
Each growth stages of crops has different looking.
Fertilizing doubles the price of crops.
Crops die if it miss the day of harvest.
Coins are used to buy new seeds.
API was used to store and fetch data for users and market.

description: A platform game made with React
detail: Dish Dash is a platform game that the player become a server who must keep customers happy by serving the food that they want.
functionality: JSON Web Token (JWT) is used to authenticate users.
Information for each user such as name, password, items, is stored in database
Instruction is given before starting.
User can choose over their level of challenge.
Leaderboards rank users in real-time and compare scores with other users who have played.
Coins are used to buy items to upgrade. It contains hearts which helps user to live longer and double-score to double the score.

description: An app for managing warehouses and inventories
detail: Instock is a team school project to deliver an Inventory Management System in one week. Our team was provided a mockup of the final product on Figma. We used Git/GitHub, JIRA and the Scrum methodology to work collaboratively and manage workflow.
functionality: User can add and edit warehouses.
User can add and edit inventories of a specific warehouse.
Server-side form validation identifies errors before the form is submitted

description: A simple chat application that allows users to talk to each other in real-time
detail: This is a real-time chat application made with Socket.io and react.
functionality: Siging up and login are required. Single JSON file is used to store user data.
User can add a friend with ID and start a chat.
User can edit the name to be displayed.
Every message that sent are saved in server. Messages contain information such as created time, user who sent, and user who received.
